com.mpagliaro98.mysubscriptions.notifications

Class NotificationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpagliaro98.mysubscriptions.notifications.NotificationService

  • public class NotificationService
extends java.lang.Object
    The notification service checks each subscription in the model, then sends a notification out if today is the user-specified number of days before the next payment date of any given subscription. Future subscription payment dates are also updated here.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.content.Context context 
      private static java.lang.String TAG 

    • Constructor Summary

      NotificationService(android.content.Context context)
      Create this class and give it the context to use later when creating notifications and accessing the subscription file.

      Helper method to create the notification channel needed to post notifications on API level >= 26.
      private void createSubNotification(android.app.NotificationManager notificationManager, java.util.List<Subscription> subscriptions)
      Build and send a notification that indicates to the user when they're being charged for a given subscription and for how much.
      private java.lang.String generateContextText(java.util.List<Subscription> subscriptions)
      Build the content text for the subscription notification by generating a short sentence for each due subscription and concatenating them together.

      Main method to create notifications for the subscriptions that require them on any given day and update any subscription dates.

      Main method to create notifications for the subscriptions that require them on any given day and update any subscription dates.
      private void sendIOExceptionNotif(android.app.NotificationManager notificationManager)
      Helper method that sends a notification indicating an error has occurred, specifically some kind of IO error.

      • processBackgroundTasks

        void processBackgroundTasks(ZeroTimeCalendar zeroTimeCalendar)
        Main method to create notifications for the subscriptions that require them on any given day and update any subscription dates.
        Parameters:
        zeroTimeCalendar - a calendar of today's date with the time set to 0:00:00

      • createNotificationChannel

        Helper method to create the notification channel needed to post notifications on API level >= 26.
        Parameters:
        notificationManager - the notification manager

      • sendIOExceptionNotif

        private void sendIOExceptionNotif(android.app.NotificationManager notificationManager)
        Helper method that sends a notification indicating an error has occurred, specifically some kind of IO error.
        Parameters:
        notificationManager - the notification manager

      • createSubNotification

        private void createSubNotification(android.app.NotificationManager notificationManager,
                                   java.util.List<Subscription> subscriptions)
        Build and send a notification that indicates to the user when they're being charged for a given subscription and for how much. If multiple subscriptions need to be notified, it will send one notification that list all of those subscriptions at once.
        Parameters:
        notificationManager - the notification manager
        subscriptions - the list of subscriptions to generate notifications for

      • generateContextText

        private java.lang.String generateContextText(java.util.List<Subscription> subscriptions)
        Build the content text for the subscription notification by generating a short sentence for each due subscription and concatenating them together.
        Parameters:
        subscriptions - the list of subscriptions to generate notifications for
        Returns:
        a string with information on every due subscription, separated by newlines
